Package org.javasimon.console.text

Machinery to convert potentially anything to a String (said differently a configurable toString() API).

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Stringifier<T>
    Value formatter for given type.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseStringifier<T>
    Basic value formatter.
    CompositeStringifier
    Dictionary (Class type,String subType)→Stringifier.
    NoneStringifier<T>
    Stringifier with particular meaning: do not stringify this value.
    StringifierFactory
    Base helper class to format values of attributes of simons.
    StringifierFactory.DateStringifier
    Stringifier implementation for Date type.
    StringifierFactory.DoubleTimeStringifier
    Stringifier implementation for Double type representing a duration.
    StringifierFactory.LongDateStringifier
    Stringifier implementation for Long type representing a timestamp.
    StringifierFactory.LongTimeStringifier
    Stringifier implementation for Long type representing a duration.
    StringifierFactory.NumberStringifier<T extends Number>
    Stringifier implementation for Number type.

Package org.javasimon.console.text Description

Machinery to convert potentially anything to a String (said differently a configurable toString() API). The CompositeStringifier is a dictionary which registers a Stringifier implementation for each Java type (String, Long, etc). A given Java type can:
  • Have different meanings (a long can be a duration, a timestamp, a counter, etc): the "sub-type" concept was introduced.
  • Be styled differently (HTML, CSV, XML, JSON, etc): a dictionary factory was introduced StringifierFactory and its subclasses CsvStringifierFactory, JsonStringifierFactory, etc.
